data.description: Log file analysis and event generator
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Evolution of simple script within corporate environment to allow
    for public disemmination. This module set differs from Stem::* in
    its direct simplicity of text configuration files and
    straight-forward event generation (email, email-to-pager, instant
    message, external program execution, etc.)
